meanings.definition: Opposed to nuclear weapons or nuclear power.
meanings.sent1: She is part of the antinuke movement.
meanings.sent2: The antinuke activists protested outside the nuclear plant.
meanings.sent3: The antinuke group had a picnic to promote their cause.
meanings.sent4: His antinuke stance was as strong as a fortress.
meanings.sent5: The antinuke symbol was painted on banners and flags.

meanings.definition: A person or group who advocates against the use of nuclear weapons.
meanings.sent1: The antinuke spoke passionately at the rally.
meanings.sent2: Many antinukes gathered to discuss disarmament.
meanings.sent3: The antinuke's cat wore a tiny protest sign.
meanings.sent4: She was a shining antinuke beacon in the community.
meanings.sent5: The antinuke's words echoed through the halls of power.
